Directions
In a small bowl, stir together mayonnaise, 'nduja, and lemon juice until well combined. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt as needed. Use right away or refrigerate in an airtight container until ready to use.
Notes
'Nduja is a spicy spreadable pork
salame
that originates from the southern Italian region of Calabria. In the US, it can be purchased at specialty shops that carry salumi/charcuterie, Italian markets, or online from producers like
Tempesta Artisan Salumi
. Look for 'nduja made with just four ingredients: pork, Calabrian chilies, salt, and lactic acid.
Make-Ahead and Storage
'Nduja mayonnaise can be refrigerated in an airtight container for up to 1 week.
